name: Trendy Loot
overview:
Trendy Loot is a sample sale and deal site that showcases one celeb worthy item at a time for a savvy price that you cannot afford to pass on. This is your chance to become trendy and wear the same styles as your favorite celebrities, but for a fraction of the cost! Hurry up, because you never know when LOOTS (sales) will end! It could be in 5 minutes, 1 hour, or even 1 day! The one thing we can tell you is that LOOTS will never last more than 36 hours.

At Trendy Loot, we work hard to offer you great deals on stylish accessories. We scour magazines, attend NYC fashion events, and consult with fashion experts to bring you the most up to date trends while also providing you with the best possible deal.

Are you ready to discover new trends and accessorize with the most up to date jewelry without putting a dent in your wallet?
